alert.note: Alert for Mazatzal Mountains; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Superior (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 28 at 12:45PM MST until January 29 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY EXTENDED UNTIL 9 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...East winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts 35 to 45 mph. Localized wind gusts to 50 mph near mountaintops. * WHERE...Superior, Mazatzal Mountains, Pinal/Superstition Mountains and Southeast Gila County. * WHEN...Until 9 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Difficult driving conditions, especially for larger vehicles traveling along roads with crosswinds. Light, unsecured objects may become airborne.
info.instruction: A Wind Advisory means that sustained wind speeds of between 30 and 40 mph are expected, or wind gusts of between 40 and 58 mph. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. In addition, strong winds over desert areas could result in briefly lowered visibilities to well under a mile at times in blowing dust or blowing sand. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Mazatzal Mountains; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Superior
